meta.title_zh: 加點與改單：中途想追加

dialogue.zh:
How 是 everything so far?
How 私 everything so far?

It’s good, 謝謝 你.
It’s good, ありがとう あなた.

dialogue.text: Can I get you anything else?
dialogue.zh:
可以 我 get 你 anything else?
できます 私 get あなた anything else?

dialogue.text: Yes, can I add one more dish?
dialogue.zh:
是的, 可以 我 add one more dish?
はい, できます 私 add one more dish?

當然. What would 你 like?
もちろん. What would あなた like?

An 點餐 of fries, 請.
An 注文 of fries, お願いします.

dialogue.text: Would you like them regular or with cheese?
dialogue.zh:
Would 你 like them regular or with cheese?
Would あなた like them regular or with cheese?

Regular 是 fine.
Regular 私 fine.

任何 sauce on the side?
Any sauce on the side?

Ketchup, 請.
Ketchup, お願いします.

不 problem. Anything to drink?
いいえ problem. Anything to drink?

可以 我 switch to lemonade?
できます 私 switch to lemonade?

dialogue.text: Of course. Would you like it with ice?
dialogue.zh:
Of course. Would 你 like it with 冰?
Of course. Would あなた like it with 氷?

是的, with 冰.
はい, with 氷.

dialogue.text: Got it. I’ll bring the lemonade and fries soon.
dialogue.zh:
Got it. 我’ll bring the lemonade and fries soon.
Got it. 私’ll bring the lemonade and fries soon.

謝謝.
ありがとう.

dialogue.text: Also, can I get a small plate?
dialogue.zh:
Also, 可以 我 get a 小 plate?
Also, できます 私 get a スモール plate?

當然.
もちろん.

Here’s a plate.
Here’s a plate.

謝謝 你.
ありがとう あなた.

dialogue.text: Your fries are coming out now.
dialogue.zh:
Your fries 是 coming 缺 now.
Your fries are coming out now.

太好了.
いいですね.

dialogue.text: Here are the fries and lemonade.
dialogue.zh:
Here 是 the fries and lemonade.
Here are the fries and lemonade.

Perfect.
Perfect.

Would 你 like another napkin?
Would あなた like another napkin?

是的, 請.
はい, お願いします.

Anything else before dessert?
Anything else before dessert?

不, that’s it.
いいえ, that’s it.

Alright. Enjoy.
Alright. Enjoy.

謝謝!
ありがとう!
